item.description:
Guest Speaker: Carleen Eve Fischer Hoffman
Organizing for Success - Declare 2013 to be Clutter Free

 

$15 in advance, WBOA members receive $5 cash back at check-in.

Carleen Eve Fischer Hoffman is the owner and founder of The Clutter Doctor, Inc. Carleen helps individuals, businesses, and nonprofits manage time and space by providing solutions for organizational problems. She does this through her three-step approach: Examine, Diagnose, Prescribe. Carleen is a local pioneer on the subject and has been featured on several radio shows, in newspaper and magazine articles, and during television interviews. She has taught classes on conquering clutter at several local colleges and produced a local TV show, “Clearing the Clutter.”

Carleen is a member and participant of several business and professional organizations and is actively involved with the Town of East Longmeadow. She also volunteers her expertise as an advisor for the Western Mass Clutter Support Group. Carleen is an established freelance writer whose work has been published in The Republican and Online Organizing.com. In her spare time, she enjoys creating art with acrylics and mixed media, metal-smithing, writing (she is working on two novels), belly dancing, traveling with her husband, coffee with friends, and an occasional nap with her dogs. Carleen has been a member of WBOA for 14 years.

After 5 Fun Stuff
• We will be offering a Special January Seasonal Cocktail (alcoholic & non alcoholic) along with our signature drink, the WBOA After 5 (both available in alcoholic & non alcoholic)

• EVERYONE who RSVPs via our Meet up page (instead of paying at the door) will be entered into a special raffle. EVERYONE who attends will receive a Free Raffle Ticket.

• January's Raffle prize will be a gift bag of goodies donated by Debbie Sorcinelli of It's A Girl Thing!

• Speed Networking will be hosted by WBOA After 5 Co-chairs Debbie & Kim. We will add our own "spin" on what is now our most anticipated part of our After 5 meetings.
item.name: WBOA After 5: Organizing for Success - Declare 2013 to be Clutter Free
